title: Polki Diamond Raani Haaram - The Royal Heirloom
features: A magnificent two-layered Raani Haaram featuring intricately set, organically shaped Polki diamonds. Each diamond is carefully chosen and hand-set in a closed setting (kundan style) to maximize brilliance. The pear-shaped pendant drops add a touch of elegance and movement. The gold is finished with a traditional Hyderabadi polish, giving it a warm, antique luster. The piece reflects the traditional Golconda diamond jewelry heritage.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)
and significant cultural celebrations like Seemantham or a Half-Saree Function. Also suitable as a statement piece for high-end modern events.
description: This Raani Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The use of uncut Polki diamonds, a hallmark of South Indian royalty, lends a unique and opulent touch. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's richness and creates a vintage feel. As an heirloom piece, it can be passed down through generations, carrying with it the legacy of your family. Each Polki diamond has its own unique characteristics. Owning a piece of such quality elevates personal style and status and showcases a deep appreciation for traditional craftsmanship.
